instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]820 2915 b, After replacing a chip left fan don't work
threads.message:
Hey Guys, 

After replacing a GPU Left fan don't work... no missing components.. 

SMC_FAN_0_CTL = 0.2V .. 

Has anyone ever had something like this ??

Thank you

threads.title: [SOLVED]820 2915 b, After replacing a chip left fan don't work
threads.message: Diode mode on that line? What GPU did you use, what date code?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820 2915 b, After replacing a chip left fan don't work
threads.message: Ya, i have 0,021v in this line.. i compare with a good board and in the same line have 0.657v. short to ground??

threads.title: [SOLVED]820 2915 b, After replacing a chip left fan don't work
threads.message: i have now removed a r5681 and the short comes pin 2 off r5681. check the bordview and pin 2 is not going anywhere..

threads.title: [SOLVED]820 2915 b, After replacing a chip left fan don't work
threads.message: Come on pin 2 is not going anywhere...... I assume you can figure out yourself with the schematic where it goes.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820 2915 b, After replacing a chip left fan don't work
threads.message: i feel so stupid..  I was just looking at the boardview, I did not even think of the scheme... Do you think a reballing to smc resolves? Or do I have to replace it?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820 2915 b, After replacing a chip left fan don't work
threads.message:
Tell me how reballing will solve a short, unless the SMC was already fucked with.
I also still don't know which GPUs you used.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820 2915 b, After replacing a chip left fan don't work
threads.message: 216 0810001 DC:1142, i already put the original and same issue!!

threads.title: [SOLVED]820 2915 b, After replacing a chip left fan don't work
threads.message: it looks stupid but when hi heat the smc short gone ( pin 2 = 0.657v ).. i will replace the SMC and after i put the results!

threads.message: You can close the post Duke.. TY
